amendment.description: To provide for the coverage of marriage and family therapist services and mental health counselor services under part B of the Medicare program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 988 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 988 proposed by Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S8480-8481; text: CR S8480-8481) To provide for the coverage of marriage and family therapist services and mental health counselor services under part B of the Medicare program, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 988 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 988 proposed by Senator Thomas.
